title: Idol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform a concert at a player's house, causing your target and all their visitors to become a Fan.
- If all players are fans, you may choose to investigate a player: learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know how many players you turned into fans after each concert, but not who.
- You don't know who's a fan.
- Fans can't roleblock or control you.
- If a Fan kills you, they will clean you.

desc:
